stack:stack.stack:script:
import os.path
if os.path.exists('/tmp/site.attrs'): file = open('/tmp/site.attrs', 'r') for line in file.readlines(): l = line.split(':', 1) if len(l) == 2: # # key/value pairs #
# # there are some attributes that don't belong in the # database # key = l[0].strip()
if key in [ 'hostname', 'rack', 'rank', 'os', 'nukedisks', 'nukecontroller' ]: continue
v = l[1].strip() value = '' for i in v: if i == "'": value += "'" value += '"' value += "\\'" value += '"' value += "'" else: value += i
if key in [ 'Kickstart_PrivatePortableRootPassword', \ 'Kickstart_PrivateRootPassword', \ 'Kickstart_PrivateDjangoRootPassword' ]: extra = 'shadow=y' else: extra = ''
os.system("/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr %s attr='%s' value='%s'" % (extra, key, value))
file.close()

/opt/stack/bin/stack set access command='*' group='apache' /opt/stack/bin/stack set access command='list*' group='wheel'
/opt/stack/bin/stack add box default
/opt/stack/bin/stack add appliance frontend longname=Frontend node=server public=false /opt/stack/bin/stack add appliance builder longname=Builder node=builder public=false /opt/stack/bin/stack add appliance barnacle longname=Barnacle node=barnacle public=false /opt/stack/bin/stack add appliance backend longname=Backend node=backend /opt/stack/bin/stack add appliance replicant longname=Replicant node=replicant /opt/stack/bin/stack add appliance switch longname=Switch public=false
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=firewall value=true
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=managed value=false
/opt/stack/bin/stack set appliance attr frontend attr=managed value=false /opt/stack/bin/stack set appliance attr backend attr=managed value=true /opt/stack/bin/stack set appliance attr switch attr=managed value=false
/opt/stack/bin/stack set appliance attr replicant attr=const_overwrite value=false
/opt/stack/bin/stack add network private \ address=&Kickstart_PrivateNetwork; \ mask=&Kickstart_PrivateNetmask; \ zone=&Kickstart_PrivateDNSDomain; \ gateway=&Kickstart_PrivateGateway; \ dns=false pxe=true
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=os value=&os;

/opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction default type=os kernel="com32 chain.c32" args=hd0 /opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction pxeflash type=os kernel="kernel memdisk bigraw" ramdisk=pxeflash.img args=keeppxe /opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction localboot type=os kernel="localboot 0" /opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction hplocalboot type=os kernel="localboot -1" /opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction memtest type=os kernel="kernel memtest"
